title: K.CSY.1
text: The student will identify the purpose and components of a computing device.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Identify and locate parts of a computing device, including sensors.
Describe the function of common components in a computing device.
Identify different types of computing devices with screens.
Identify tasks and activities at home and at school that use screens.
Demonstrate proper use of computing devices.
